title: Reported for verbal abuse
body:
When i said nothing all game??? 
will i get punished?

replies.body: If you haven't broken the [Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/), then you have absolutely nothing to worry about. Also, you shouldn't really know if you've been reported or not, unless the trigger message comes up specifically for you, in which case you probably have been breaking the code, as that takes quite a few reports to activate.
